ComicInfo.Colorist: George Cox III,Moose Baumann,Violent Hues,Moose Baumann,Violent Hues
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T22:14:23 [Issue ID 4000-38242] urn:comicvine:4000-38242 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 03:35:52. [Issue ID 54129]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Solution, Hardcase and Choice travel in a spaceship towards the moon after dealing with some villainous ultras around Amber Hunt, who was left hovering over Los Angeles emitting varying degrees of light. While in the spaceship, they find that the villainous groups, the Omega Team and Quattro, are right in front of them in another spaceship. The foes stop in space to take a fight to the Solution and the other heroes. A battle ensues in space between the two factions while Tech finds her way on to her opponent's spaceship to control it, but since their ship is extraterrestrial in origin, she cannot. Gate finds his way on the hero's ship and is able to plant a nano-virus that will cause their ship to explode. The fight finally stops with the Omega Team and Quattro going back to their ship, stranding the others in space. Tech gets in contact with the Alternate who informs them that they can get back on the ship for some more distance since they are so close to the moon already and then the ship will explode.
Events in this issue continue in Break-Thru #2
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/solution-4-racing-to-the-moon/4000-38242/
ComicInfo.Title: Racing To The Moon
